website_summaries.verdict: These heat-resistant welding sleeves are great for use at steel mills, manufacturing plants and other industrial workplaces.
pros: Consist of high-end leather that safeguards you against spark and offers extended wear
Sewn with Kevlar thread to ensure immense strength and durability
Boasts black anodized snaps and rivets that do not corrode and prevent flashback
Sold in a variety of sizes
cons: Leather is very thin and creates an unpleasant odor
Snaps sometimes break off the sleeves

product_meta.title: West Chester IRONCAT 7000 Cowhide Leather Welding Cape Sleeve - Golden Yellow, Large Size Cape Jacket with Heat Resistance. Welding Gears
product_meta.description: Size:LargeWest Chester Protective Gears Cowhide Leather Welding Cape Sleeve is an ideal welding safe apparel to be used for protection against spark and spatter. This leather welding jacket is cut to precision and features adjustable snaps for wrist and collar which makes it more desirable and functional. This work safety cape jacket has a snapshot pocket on each sleeve, anodized snaps to prevent wear and reinforced rivets that ensure durability. Welding leathers are used in different industries including manufacturing, gas welding, aircraft, steel, automotive, etc. to ensure worker safety. This weld safety apparel is available in various sizes, each offering an appropriate fit.
feature_bullets: Tanned Cape Sleeves: welding cape is designed to provide heat resistance during welding applications, protecting the user from sparks and spatter

Design: the cowhide leather jacket includes soapstone storage pockets on each sleeve and adjustable snaps for wrist and collar, making it more functional. This safety jacket is reinforced using additional leather
Features: this welding apparel is stitched with strong Kevlar thread that offers heat resistance. The cape jacket can also be coordinated with a weld safety bib
Applications: the leather cape is ideal for use in steel mills, shipyards, automotive assembly, gas welding procedures, torch work, manufacturing, and construction industries
Specifications: large size split leather cape sleeve features a straight 11 in. armhole, 22 in. neck opening, 6 in. sleeve opening, 26 in. chest width, 25 in. sleeve length, and 10.5 in. body length
